pkgmetadata.longdescription: Models of Decision Confidence and Metacognition // Provides fitting functions and other tools for decision confidence and metacognition researchers, including meta-d'/d', often considered to be the gold standard to measure metacognitive efficiency. Also allows to fit several static models of decision making and confidence to test the assumptions underlying meta-d'/d' and which may serve as an alternative when the assumptions of meta-d'/d' do not hold. See also Rausch et al. (2023) doi:10.1037/met0000634.
